About the Company: Tilaknagar Industries Ltd (TI) is a leading manufacturer of liquor across the major categories - Whisky, Brandy, Rum, Vodka and Gin. TI has a leading market position in the southern and western parts of India.The product range of the company includes Whisky-Senate Royale Whisky,Mansion House Whisky,Senate Whisky,Shot Whisky,etc.Brandy-Mansion House Brandy and Courrier Napoleon Brandy.Rum-Savoy Club Rum,Royal Choice Rum and Madira Rum.Vodka-Classic Vodka and Castle Club.Gin-Savoy Club Dry Gin and Royal Choice Duet Gin.
